dc:title: On Pilgrimage - March/April 1977
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: While housebound at Tamar's place in Vermont she reflects on the effect Solzehenitsyn's writing on her faith and reminisces about a Russian friend from her youth who recently died.
